column4: With the volume control that comes with intrepid i couldn't get my microphone to work. Using alsamixer i can hear a bit of recorded sound with my mic, but it's too low. I use intrepid on a Asus f3jc laptop, any ideas??
did you use mic boost in alsa?
no
there in options, there is a mic boost options, 20db
ill try that
i couldn't locate any boot option
it isnt a boot option, double click the volum icon
under edit>preferences, there is a selectable box for mic boost
then under the switches tab, you have to select it to be enabled
ok
find it ok?
noo
microhone boost not present, it's a bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/220787
any other way to boost the mic??
what version ubuntu are you using?
inprepid,
im using 8.04 LTS< good to know about that bug in 8.10
it appear in this version too
i dont have any other suggestions
:(, thanks
